snippet: Greg Schiano, who grew up in New Jersey and coached football at Rutgers for 11 seasons, returns to the New York area in his first season as coach of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
abstract: Tampa Bay Buccaneers coach Greg Schiano, who grew up in New Jersey and coached football at Rutgers for 11 seasons, returns to the New York area for upcoming game against the New York Giants.
lead_paragraph: Greg Schiano, who grew up in New Jersey and coached football at Rutgers for 11 seasons, returns to the New York area in his first season as coach of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.

headline.seo: Buccaneers Coach Schiano Is Still a Jersey Guy for Part of Year
headline.main: Business Trip as Schiano Returns to New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Business Trip as Schiano Returns to New Jersey
